pageContext.title: Video: Can a non-engineer survive a day at the model factory?
pageContext.content:
Can a non-engineer survive a day at a model factory of the future without breaking anything? Tech in Asia finds out.

Launched in August 2018 as part of Singapore’s Agency for Science, Technology, and Research (ASTAR)’s Model Factory Initiative, the Model Factory @ ARTC is a 15,000 square feet facility that houses state-of-the-art technologies, allowing enterprises to invest and integrate advanced manufacturing processes into their production setups.

Find out more about ASTAR’s Future of Manufacturing Initiative here.
